SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_INTERACTION_SPONSOR_SETUNAVAILABLECHILD
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Used to set the UNAVAILABLECHILDID on a sponsor type of interaction extension
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_INTERACTION_SPONSOR_SETUNAVAILABLECHILD ( @interactionID uniqueidentifier = null, -- Interaction ID of the interaction to add the departed child to @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID uniqueidentifier = null, -- Unavailable child ID @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier = null -- Used to track who added the interaction, retrieved with USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT if null ) as begin -- Used for setting date fields to today's date declare @currentDate datetime = null set @currentDate = getdate()
-- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @changeAgentID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @changeAgentID output
update dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION set UNAVAILABLECHILDID = @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID, CHANGEDBYID = @changeAgentID, DATECHANGED = @currentDate where ID = @interactionID
end
